{{Description|The power of ancient battlegrounds has been concentrated within [[Domain]]s of late... Use the power of [[Original Resin]] to cause the silver tree to bloom so that your weapons and spirit might thus be strengthened.}}
'''Overflowing Abundance''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/02/03 04:00 - 2025/02/10 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Domains of Mastery]]: Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 25 or above and after activating corresponding Domains of Mastery
* [[Domains of Forgery]]: Reach Adventure Rank 15 or above and after activating corresponding Domains of Forgery

===Summary===
* During the "Overflowing Abundance" event, successfully challenge Domains of Mastery or Domains of Forgery and consume "[[Original Resin]]" to double your rewards. You can double your rewards up to 3 times a day!
* During the event, all Domains of Mastery and Domains of Forgery that you have already unlocked will be available all day.
